summary.para: Contains classes that implement reporting functionality in Blazor applications.
A control that displays an interactive preview of a document generated from a report and allows the user to view, print, and export a report document in hosted Blazor WebAssembly apps.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Enables Development Mode for extended diagnostics.
Gets or sets a string that specifies the unique report name.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxWasmDocumentViewer.SetParametersAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.ParameterView)

summary.para: This method is intended for internal use. You do not need to call it directly from your code.

member.param: The parameters supplied by the component’s parent in the render tree.
member.returns: A Task that completes when the DxDocumentViewer has finished updating and rendering itself.

summary.para: A nested component that allows you to specify where to send requests from the Document Viewer.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
A control that is the End-User Report Designer in Blazor WebAsssembly applications.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxWasmReportDesigner.DevelopmentMode

summary.para: Enables Development Mode for extended diagnostics.

member.value: true to enable Development Mode; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Gets or sets a string that specifies the unique report name.
